content: shaping back neck height gained approx 3 3 cm c raglan shaping half brioche worked flat raglan shaping is worked while continuing in half brioche across the yoke stitches front bands continue alongside the body in double knit with buttonholes worked at set points all shaping is worked on rs row only © 2026 qing studio ltd this pattern is for personal use only no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or sold without written permission 10 increase method all raglan increases are worked in the same way increase k yo k into one stitch adds 2 stitches rs raglan increase row instruction raglan shaping is worked on rs row only following the raglan table each rs row in the table indicates whether it is a body increase row a sleeve increase row or both always refer to the table to determine which increases to work on that row on every rs shaping row work as follows work the left front band in double knitting as established work across the front left section to the first raglan marker on row marked body increase 🔴 in the table work raglan increases at the body sections only in the stitch 1 before the marker the 2nd between left front and left sleeve 2 after the marker the 5th between left sleeve raglan and back 3 before the marker the 6th between back and right sleeve raglan 4 after the marker the 9th between right sleeve raglan and right front at each of these spot work k yo k in that stitch work across the sections as established to the next increase point repeat on row marked sleeve increase 🔵 in the table work raglan increases on both sides of each sleeve section 1 sleeve 1 after the 3rd marker before the 4th marker 2 sleeve 2 after the 7th marker before the 8th marker on row marked for both body and sleeve increases work all increases as described above d buttonholes buttonholes are worked vertically within the left front band during rs row of the double-knit section start making buttonhole column row 1 rs with mc k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif twice slip the sts you just worked back to the rhn with cc sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 twice turn to work ws © 2026 qing studio ltd this pattern is for personal use only no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or sold without written permission 11 buttonhole column row 2 ws bring mc yarn under cc yarn with mc sl1 wyib k1 sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 sl1 wyif sl1 wyif slip the sts you just worked back to the rhn with cc p1 sl1 wyif k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif sl1 wyib sl1 wyif turn row 1a rs with mc k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif twice yo continue working across the full row as established row 1b rs with cc sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 twice yo slip
